stories.fantasy_headline: Alchemists Uncover Secret Behind Painful Potions
stories.fantasy_story: The Alchemists' Guild has finally learned why many folk feel weak after taking health elixirs. It seems certain potions cling to muscle fibers, causing a tiny internal leak. This magical imbalance can drain strength from those who consume them, hindering their recovery.

stories.fantasy_headline: Sea Sages Reveal Deep Shadows Threaten Ocean Life
stories.fantasy_story: Ocean Wizards have discovered strange deep sea shadows that linger for days, even months. These dark spells are caused by fierce storms and murky currents, stealing precious light from the seabed. Many aquatic creatures now find themselves lost in perpetual twilight, struggling to find food.

stories.fantasy_headline: New Magic Codex Holds Countless Tomes, Eases Eyes
stories.fantasy_story: Master enchanters have crafted a new Magic Codex, able to hold a whole kingdom's library in one's hand. Unlike tiny scrying mirrors, this artifact offers a peaceful reading experience, with no distractions. Its gentle, guiding glow keeps the reader's vision clear, even in dim light.
